cast.name: Big Daddy Kane Big Daddy Kane
娜奥米·坎贝尔 Naomi Campbell
乔伊·斯特凡诺 Joey Stefano
伊莎贝拉·罗西里尼 Isabella Rossellini
塔蒂阿娜·冯·芙丝汀宝 Tatiana von Furstenberg

introduction: The 60 minute video for Madonna's Sex book is a great work of art. It's like seeing the book come alive as it's almost in every location. There is no talking in this film just 1920's music and Madonna is absolutely beautiful. Very rare to find now in days it's a must have for a every Madonna fan but the quality more than likely will be terrible due to the number of times copying.The video shows Madonna nude most of the time laying on her back against the ocean, riding a bicycle, dancing with Naomi Campbell and kissing and horsing around with then boyfriend Vanilla Ice. It's a lovely companion for the book. Very artistic and creative.Remember this film was never released only given by Madonna to 100 of her closest friends at the Sex Book release party. Somehow the video got out and might be on sell on Ebay time and time again.
